TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner implements class System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner
Public Class DataSourceDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner Implements IDataSourceDesigner
type DataSourceDesigner = class inherit ControlDesigner interface IDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在设计宿主中为 类提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a design host for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是基适用于数据源设计器中，如， ，和类。The class is the base class for data source designers, such as the , , and classes. 如果你创建一个新的数据源控件，你可能还要创建自定义控件设计器为您的控件和派生从类。If you create a new data source control, you might also want to create a custom control designer for your control and derive it from the class. 类具有两个事件方法：和方法。The class has two event methods: the and methods. 这两种事件可以暂时禁用与方法，设置属性。Both of these events can be temporarily disabled with the method, which sets the property. 可以使用再次启用事件方法方法。The event methods can be enabled again with the method. 有两种可用于评估架构或视图的相等性，而无需创建类的实例的静态方法：There are two static methods that you can use to evaluate the equivalency of schemas or views without creating an instance of the class: - 方法比较两个架构。The method compares two schemas. - 方法比较两个视图的架构。The method compares the schemas of two views. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用自定义数据源控件具有几个其他小自定义类下, 表中列出。The following code example shows how to use a custom data source control with several other small custom classes, as listed in the following table. |自定义类Custom class|派生自Derived from| |------------------|------------------| |`CustomDataSource`|| |`CustomDataSourceDesigner`|| |`CustomDataSourceView`|| |`CustomDesignDataSourceView`|| |`BookListViewSchema`|| |`CustomIDFieldSchema`|| |`CustomTitleFieldSchema`|| |`BookItem` （两个字段数据结构。）`BookItem` (A two-field data structure.)|| 后编译的代码示例，在设计视图中打开的.aspx 页，并将`DataSourceID`属性设置为自定义数据源控件的 ID。After compiling the code example, open the .aspx page in Design view and then set the `DataSourceID` property to the ID of the custom data source control. [!code-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/CS/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataSourceDesignerSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataSourceDesignerSample/VB/DataSourceDesignerSample.aspx#6)]

span.para: 若要在派生类中的设计时提供的操作列表菜单命令，必须重写属性以返回自定义与派生自的自定义项的对象对象。
To provide commands for the action list menu at design time in a derived class, you must override the property to return a custom object with custom items that are derived from the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计时设计宿主调用构造函数。The constructor is called by the design host at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ActionLists As DesignerActionListCollection

summary.span: 获取项的列表，其中的项用来在设计时创建操作列表菜单。

span.span: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.

value.span: 包含控件设计器的操作列表项的 对象。

span.span: A object containing the action list items for the control designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建简单复合控件与控件和控件，以及设置属性，`Text`上两个内部控件的属性以及和属性控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple composite control with a control and a control, along with properties to set the `Text` properties on both internal controls, as well as the and properties of the control. 关联的控件设计器类创建三个命令时，每个用于设置在控件中，两个属性和其设置可以回滚撤消功能设计宿主中。An associated control designer class creates three commands, each of which sets two properties on the control, and whose settings can be rolled back with the undo functionality in the design host. 尽管此代码示例不使用自定义对象，它演示如何重写属性。Although the code example does not use a custom object, it illustrates how to override the property. [!code-csharp[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/CS/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerInvokeTransactedChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerInvokeTransactedChange/VB/InvokeTransactedChangeSample.vb#1)]

span.para: 当你创建的自定义类，派生自类，必须重写属性。在重写方法中，首先调用基类，来创建默认值对象，并将自定义的特定于你的类的操作列表。

When you create a custom class that is derived from the class, you must override the property. In your override method, first call the base class to create the default object, and then add a custom list of actions that are specific to your class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanConfigure As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanConfigure { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中启用或禁用特定数据源的设计时配置的自定义类属性。Use the property in a custom class to enable or disable design-time configuration for a specific data source. 设计宿主中的如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]使用属性来确定是否配置数据源的命令显示在操作列表菜单中在设计时。A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the property to determine whether a command to configure the data source appears in the action list menu at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CanRefreshSchema As Boolean
public: virtual property bool CanRefreshSchema { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以调用 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the method can be called.

value.span: 如果可以调用 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the can be called; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用派生类来启用或禁用能够在设计时为特定数据源刷新架构中的属性。Use the property in a derived class to enable or disable the ability to refresh the schema at design time for a specific data source. 如果你的应用程序需要固定的数据结构，但在架构将永远不会更改，你想属性以返回`false`。If your application requires an invariant data structure and the schema will never change, you want the property to return `false`. 设计宿主中的如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]使用属性来确定是否要刷新的架构的命令显示在操作列表菜单中在设计时。A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)] uses the property to determine whether a command to refresh the schema appears in the action list menu at design time. 在设计主机如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，你可以看到通过完成以下过程的操作中的属性：In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the property in action by completing the following process: 1. 在页面上放置或控件。On your page, place a or an control. 2. 在设计视图，请在操作列表中，单击**配置**。In Design view, on the action list, click **Configure**. 3. 从数据源中删除几个字段。Remove a few fields from the data source. 4. 在操作列表中，单击**刷新架构**。On the action list, click **Refresh Schema**.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Configure() cil managed
abstract member Configure : unit -> unit override this.Configure : unit -> unit

summary.span: 启动设计宿主中的数据源配置实用工具。

span.span: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中不支持方法类; 但是，它可以重写通过自定义数据源设计器从继承类。The method is not supported in the class; however, it can be overridden by custom data source designers inheriting from the class. 在设计主机如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，你可以看到中通过完成以下过程的操作方法：In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you can see the method in action by completing the following process: 1. Put或在页面上的控件。Put a or an control on your page. 2. 在设计视图中，单击操作列表上**配置**。In Design view, on the action list, clicking **Configure**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到关联的数据源以刷新其控件设计宿主中的每个控件的控件设计器。The method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host. 方法，可以抑制与方法或通过调用用参数的方法`false`。The method can be suppressed with the method or by calling the method with an argument of `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知绑定到架构中的字段已更改关联的数据源的每个控件的控件设计器。The method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed. 方法，可以抑制与方法或通过调用用自变量的属性`false`。The method can be suppressed with the method or by calling the property with an argument of `false`.
